name: Kimai
title: kimai.org
shortDescription: Kimai is an open-source time-tracking solution designed for businesses of all sizes. It allows users to track work time and generate detailed summaries of activities by customer, project, or time period. Its browser-based interface ensures compatibility across devices, including mobile. Kimai simplifies the traditional time-tracking process, replacing manual timesheet entries with a more efficient, feature-rich platform.
cons: May require technical knowledge for setup
Limited marketing compared to proprietary tools
Dependent on community for updates and features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Clockify
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Free for unlimited users and projects
